text: The Cadillac CT6 is a full-size luxury car Made By Cadillac in two generations. The first one was revealed in 2015, at New York International Auto Show 2015 and went on sale in March 2016, it is also the first car to adopt Cadillac revised name strategy. and the first full size Cadillac since, the Fleetwood was discontinued in 1996 and in 2020, the CT6 was discontinued in The United States to be replaced by the Cadillac Celestiq however, its still sold and produced in China. == References == CT6 Category:2010s automobiles Category:Sedans Category:2020s automobiles
title: Cadillac CT6
